00002 #include "str_utils.h"
00003 
00013 int cleanstring(char *buffer, int max_chars) {
00014         int linesize = 0;
00015         int i = 0, j = 0;
00016         
00017         if(!buffer) {
00018                 return 0;
00019         }
00020         
00021         if(max_chars < 0 || max_chars > MAX_STRING_SIZE) {
00022                 #ifdef DEBUG
00023                 printf("WARNING: INVALID max_chars SENT TO readline()!!!\n");
00024                 #endif
00025                 return 0;
00026         }
00027         linesize = strlen(buffer);
00028         
00029         // Look for interesting characters
00030         i = 0;
00031         while(buffer[i] == ' ' || buffer[i] == 0x0A) {
00032                 i++;
00033                 linesize--;
00034         }
00035         // Move everything to the beginning
00036         j = 0;
00037         // If we need to move at all
00038         if(i != 0) {
00039                 while(j < linesize) {
00040                         buffer[j] = buffer[i];
00041                         buffer[i] = 0x00;
00042                         j++; i++;
00043                 }
00044         }
00045         
00046         // Now clean the end
00047         i = linesize-1;
00048         while(buffer[i] == ' ' || buffer[i] == 0x0A) {
00049                 buffer[i] = 0x00;
00050                 i--;
00051                 linesize--;
00052         }
00053         
00054         return linesize;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00064 int readline(char *buffer, int max_chars) {
00065         if(!buffer) return 0;
00066         if(max_chars < 0 || max_chars > MAX_STRING_SIZE) {
00067                 #ifdef DEBUG
00068                 printf("WARNING: INVALID max_chars SENT TO readline()!!!\n");
00069                 #endif
00070                 return 0;
00071         }
00072         fgets(buffer, max_chars, stdin);
00073         return cleanstring(buffer, max_chars);
00074 
00075 }
